message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I believe $10000 would be a fair price for me to purchase it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $17000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While $17000 is a bit out of my budget, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $15000 as a counteroffer.

I understand that $15000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $16500. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with $16000 for the product.
